title: Red Receives the Urgent Message
summary: Little Red Riding Hood’s mother hands her a basket of medicine and food, urgently instructing her to deliver it to Grandmother who has fallen gravely ill. Despite warnings about the dangerous woods, Red insists she can handle the journey, determined to prove her independence.

title: Red Enters the Haunted Woods
summary: Red sets out and enters the woods, quickly noticing unnatural silence and eerie shadows. She hears whispers and sees fleeting figures among the trees; when a mysterious voice calls her name, Red chooses to ignore it and presses forward, clutching her basket tightly.

title: The Wolf Confronts Red
summary: The Wolf steps onto Red’s path, posing as a friendly stranger and asking probing questions about her destination. Sensing danger, Red lies about her route, but the Wolf notices her basket and decides to follow her, intent on reaching Grandmother’s house first.

title: The Wolf Deceives Grandmother
summary: The Wolf arrives ahead of Red at Grandmother’s cottage and tricks Grandmother into letting him in by mimicking Red’s voice. Once inside, he attacks Grandmother and hides her in the cellar, then disguises himself in her clothing to wait for Red’s arrival.

title: Red Arrives and Senses Danger
summary: Red arrives at the cottage and immediately notices oddities: the door is ajar, and the interior is unnaturally dark. She calls for Grandmother, receiving suspicious responses from the Wolf in disguise. Red, recalling her mother’s warnings, secretly arms herself with a kitchen knife.

title: Red Discovers the Wolf’s Trap
summary: Red attempts to get closer to the bed while questioning the disguised Wolf. When she spots Grandmother’s necklace on the floor, she realizes the deception. Red confronts the Wolf, who leaps from the bed to attack her, forcing Red to defend herself with the knife.

title: Red Fights for Survival
summary: A violent struggle ensues between Red and the Wolf, resulting in the cottage being wrecked. Red wounds the Wolf but is cornered; she escapes to the cellar and discovers Grandmother, injured but alive. Red quickly decides to barricade the door and search for another escape.

title: The Hunter Intervenes
summary: As the Wolf breaks down the cellar door, a local hunter arrives, drawn by the screams and chaos. The hunter confronts the Wolf with his rifle, and after a tense standoff, shoots the Wolf, rescuing Red and Grandmother. Red thanks the hunter and helps her grandmother to safety outside.

title: Red Makes a Final Decision
summary: With the danger passed, Red chooses to stay with Grandmother overnight and helps tend to her wounds. The hunter offers to escort them home, but Red insists on checking the woods for any more threats before leaving, determined to ensure their safety after her harrowing experience.
